settings.title: How it works
settings.text:
How to Wear Digital Fashion SP-IT Guide to Nailing the Shot Every Time BE LIT
Do Don’t
Even and
Bright Lighting		 Strong Shadows
Back Lighting
BE FIT
Do Don’t
Fitted Physical Clothes
w/ Simple Design		 Oversized or
Baggy Clothes
BE SHARP
Do Don’t
1MG Quality
Sharp and Clear		 Low Image Quality
Out of Focus
BE SLEEK
Do Don’t
Wear an underpinning which will be fully covered by the digital fashion garment. Cover areas you want exposed
Forget your hair! Keep it pushed back.
